geometry

Class Geometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • scene.SceneElement
      • geometry.Geometry
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Curve, Line, RackGeometry, RingGeometry, TriangleHub, WheelGeometry

    public abstract class Geometry
extends SceneElement
    An abstract class used to house all generalized geometry logic. Geometry classes define the shapes, rotations, and spacial orientations of components found in the piece package. These classes are supplemented by those in the piece package to allow for spirograph generation. Geometry may be solid or hollow. A hollow shape has a border but no center, these are used to define RingGeometry.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Geometry()
      Constructs a typical geometric object wherein the inside is solid.
      Geometry(boolean isHollow)
      Constructs a geometric object wherein the inside of the shape is hollow.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Geometry

        public Geometry()
        Constructs a typical geometric object wherein the inside is solid.

      • Geometry

        public Geometry(boolean isHollow)
        Constructs a geometric object wherein the inside of the shape is hollow. This constructor is primarily used to define the inner shape of rings.
        Parameters:
        isHollow - if true, the shape will be hollow and gears will be defined on the inside rather than outside.
